title: New patch just butchered my fps?
body: On 10/25/17 i was playing league as normal, i then went for a break and during that time the latest (7.21) patch came out, so i patched the game and the next game i joined my fps went down to on average 6-10fps, i have a pretty old pc and only usually get like 40-50fps but for me thats still enough to play, but this is borderline impossible. Any help?

replies.body: You might have some pretty bad game files after the update, see if a repair or our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help repatch you up.   You might have some bad drivers too with anolder pc, try the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC settings and drivers. I hope that helps!
